sentences.english: My small business operates on a razor-thin profit margin.
sentences.chinese: 我的生意属小本经营，利润微薄。

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但开发商不愿为低收入家庭建造低利润的单元房。

sentences.english: If you make the company better and better, profits will naturally follow.
sentences.chinese: 公司越做越好，利润自然随之而来。

sentences.english: Some investors even raked in up to 40 percent in profits.
sentences.chinese: 一些投资者甚至迅速赚得高达40%的利润。

sentences.english: The auctioneer's services are paid for in the form of …
sentences.chinese: 提示了这一段讲的是拍卖人所得的利润。

sentences.english: Through bad operation, the company had a slump in profits.
sentences.chinese: 由于经营不善，公司利润骤降。

sentences.english: Since the bosses can't do without profit workers have an dege.
sentences.chinese: 由于老板不能没有利润，工人们就占了上风。

sentences.english: Weston now demanded all profits from these sales go entirely to the investors.
sentences.chinese: 威斯顿如今却要求所有销售的利润均归投资者。

sentences.english: But small auctions can lead to low winning bids, and thus less profit.
sentences.chinese: 此外，小型拍卖会导致中标价过低，利润从而减少。

sentences.english: Further reduction impossible as margin already dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 利润已无法保证，再让价已不可能。

sentences.english: Revenue and Margin Driver Suppliers take actions that go much further than improving supply chain efficiencies, reactively or proactively.
sentences.chinese: 收入和边际利润驱动厂商对供应链的变革更进一步。

sentences.english: PROFIT】This company makes great profits from manufacturing automobiles.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司从生产汽车中获得大量利润。

sentences.english: Before, Shenyin Wanguo Research Institute that is a special report on the Margin analysis .
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，申银万国研究所是对利润分析的特别报告。

sentences.english: Since replacement costs are only part of the profits, net profits are higher.
sentences.chinese: 因为替代成本仅仅是利润的一部分，所以净利润更高。

sentences.english: Since replacement costs are only part of the profits, net profits are higher.
sentences.chinese: 因为替代成本仅仅是利润的一部分，所以净利润更高。

sentences.english: “Counterfeiting is primarily motivated by its potentially huge profits,” says Kopp.
sentences.chinese: “推动造假的主要是潜在的巨大利润，”Kopp说。

definition: achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
